llm_res.rule: The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers.
A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.

llm_res: NO. The interface provided in the code does not contain the function `transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)`.
